H0.text: Nervous is the human body system that forms a barrier between internal body structures and the external environment.

H1.text: The digestive system is the human body system that forms a barrier between internal body structures and the external environment.

H2.text: Circulatory system is the human body system that forms a barrier between internal body structures and the external environment.

H3.text: The integumentary system forms a barrier between internal body structures and the external environment.

A4.text: The integumentary system acts as a protective physical barrier between the external environment and the internal environment.
